General.Name: NeoPharm CO. LTD
General.Description: NeoPharm CO., LTD. manufactures and sells skin care products in South Korea. The company offers Atopalm, a non-steroid product for sensitive and dry skin; skin dermo-cosmetic products under the Real Barrier brand; products for sensitive, dry, oily, or trouble-prone skin under the ZEROID brand; body moisturizers under the Derma-B brand; and sport care products for athletes under the MISSION ATHELETCARE brand. NeoPharm CO., LTD. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Daejeon, South Korea.
